job_title: Pharmacy Technician in San Bernardino, CA
cons: A long laundry list of them. Business ethics don't exist here. Can't use sick time without the permission of the CEO, and she feels that she is legally entitled to run your life when it comes to your health.

pros: Day went by quickly because it was very busy.
cons: too much going on at once, lots of people didn't really know what they are doing.

review_title: Long-term employee that is concerned about prior posts because they all appear to be by disgruntled former employees.
job_title: Anonymous Employee in San Bernardino, CA
pros: I appreciate IBHS because they care about their patients. I have worked with this company for over a decade. Most of the staff in our division have been here for over a decade. I have been able to start programs to meet the needs of the community, which is great. We are often the place that people choose to go to. The staff turnover is low for our County-funded programs. The 401K is excellent.
cons: Our salaries are competitive with County programs but not with private agencies so it is difficult to keep staff in some divisions. I am tired of our agency being used as a punching bag by former employees (who are no longer employed for a reason).

pros: Personable and hard-working co-workers, most have been there for multiple years (several for almost 2 decades), 401K with large match available after 1 year.
cons: Staff attendance is tracked closely (which is reasonable but I needed to put something here). Persons who misrepresent their time and attendance are not encouraged to apply because they will often leave quickly.

job_title: PCN Department in San Bernardino, CA
pros: Opportunity for professional growth, however, your own personal mental well being in exchange.
cons: Stressful, hostile, unhealthy work environment. Overseeing and Directing Program’s Psychologist severely lacking professionalism  and integrity. Very shady and underhanded dealings in the behavioral health sector. Crooked! The pay grade is embarrassing in comparison to other county positions.

pros: Very nice co-workers. Patient care is a high priority.Improved its technology. Vision for growth
cons: Poor benefits. Many employees do not stay very long. Power failures shut down main facility.
